importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when Biden completed his radiation therapy course, marking a significant milestone in his cancer treatment journey.
The date when Biden's office announced the diagnosis of an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.
The date when Biden began a pill regimen to treat his prostate cancer, indicating early intervention in his treatment timeline.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period from early treatment initiation to completion of radiation therapy, showing the progression and timeline of Biden's cancer treatment.

keyTakeAways: Former President Joe Biden has completed a course of radiation therapy as part of his treatment for prostate cancer.
The cancer was diagnosed as aggressive and had spread to his bones, according to a spokesperson in May 2025.
Biden began a pill regimen earlier in 2025 as part of his initial treatment.
He also underwent Mohs surgery earlier in the year for skin cancer, indicating a history of multiple health interventions.
His daughter Ashley posted a video of him ringing the bell at Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology, symbolizing the completion of a treatment phase.
Biden expressed confidence in overcoming the illness, stating that the cancer had not penetrated vital organs and that his bones were strong.
He remains active in public life and is scheduled to speak at events in Boston and Omaha, highlighting his ongoing public engagement despite health challenges.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a full course of radiation therapy as part of his treatment for an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. He had previously begun a pill regimen and undergone Mohs surgery for skin cancer. The treatment milestone was shared publicly by his daughter, Ashley Biden, who posted a video of her father ringing the treatment completion bell at Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology in Philadelphia. Biden expressed confidence in overcoming the illness, citing strong bone health and absence of organ penetration. Despite his health challenges, he remains active in public life, including speaking at events in Boston and Omaha. This development is significant for the public, as it demonstrates a high-profile political figure confronting serious illness with resilience and transparency.
title: Biden Completes Radiation Therapy for Prostate Cancer
